verses.verse: You also, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> you a <S%H3843>tile,<s%> and <S%H5414>lay<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and <S%H2710>portray<s%> on it the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%>

And <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, and <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1785>fort<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, and <S%H8210>cast<s%> a <S%H5550>mount<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it; <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> also <S%H5921>against<s%> it, and <S%H7760>set<s%> battering <S%H3733>rams<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

Moreover <S%H3947>take<s%> you to you an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H4227>pan,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> it for a <S%H7023>wall<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and <S%H3559>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> it, and it shall be <S%H4692>besieged,<s%> and you shall lay <S%H6696>siege<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it. <S%H1931>This<s%> shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H7901>Lie<s%> you also on your <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H7760>lay<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on it: according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that you shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> on it you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

For I have <S%H5414>laid<s%> on you the <S%H8141>years<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> so shall you <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And when you have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> them, <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H8145>again<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> your <S%H3227>right<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> I have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> you each <S%H3117>day<s%> for a <S%H8141>year.<s%>

Therefore you shall <S%H3559>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4692>siege<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and your <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be <S%H2834>uncovered,<s%> and you shall <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will lay <S%H5688>bands<s%> on you, and you shall not <S%H2015>turn<s%> you from one <S%H6654>side<s%> to another, <S%H5704>till<s%> you have <S%H3615>ended<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H4692>siege.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> you also to you <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and <S%H6321>beans,<s%> and <S%H5742>lentils,<s%> and <S%H1764>millet,<s%> and <S%H3698>fitches,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H3899>bread<s%> thereof, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that you shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> on your <S%H6654>side,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

And your <S%H3978>meat<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> shall be by <S%H4946>weight,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> a <S%H3117>day:<s%> from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

You shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> also <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure,<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin:<s%> from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time<s%> shall you <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it as <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H5692>cakes,<s%> and you shall <S%H5746>bake<s%> it with <S%H1561>dung<s%> that <S%H6627>comes<s%> out of <S%H120>man,<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3602>Even<s%> <S%H3602>thus<s%> shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H2931>defiled<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will <S%H5080>drive<s%> them.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD!<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> has not been <S%H2930>polluted:<s%> for from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> up even <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> have I not <S%H398>eaten<s%> of that which <S%H5038>dies<s%> of itself, or is <S%H2966>torn<s%> in pieces; <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> there <S%H6292>abominable<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> into my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H1241>cow's<s%> <S%H6832>dung<s%> for <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H1561>dung,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H5921>therewith.<s%>

Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> by <S%H4948>weight,<s%> and with <S%H1674>care;<s%> and they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure,<s%> and with <S%H8078>astonishment:<s%>

That they may <S%H2637>want<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H251>another,<s%> and <S%H4743>consume<s%> away for their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
